Assalāmu `alaikum Warahmatullāhi Wabrakatuh,

At the outset you should thank Allah for guiding you to ask us this question. Allah Ta’ala want to guide you and keep you away from bad, evil and sinful acts.

 

It is completely haram (strictly prohibited) for you and the girl to sleep together in one bed. The dirty and filthy acts referred to are haram and major sin. Those sins incur the wrath and anger of Allah.

 

You are now 19 years old. You are baligh. The girl is 13 years old and in all probability she too must be baligh. What if the Shaytan mislead both of you and the fondling etc which are haram lead to intercourse?

 

What if the girl falls pregnant? Will you be happy? Will she be happy?

 

Will you bear all the burden and embarrassment that comes along with that? Will she be able to bear all the embarrassment?

 

You should seriously consider confiding in your mother or father and tell them what has transpired. They will have insight and take the necessary steps to separate your’ll.

 

Do remember that you have another brother. The “sister” may also make advancements to him. You need to alert your parents and stop this evil act immediately before you it gets any worse.

 

Also make tawba and repent to Allah Ta’ala. You should immediately reprimand the “sister” and warn her you’ll be telling your parents about her evil actions. This will help her to stop the wrong and protect her chastity.

 

And Allah Ta'āla Knows Best,

Muftī Ebrahim Desai
